alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kit Carson County; Yuma (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 17 at 5:52PM MDT until April 18 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MDT /NOON CDT/ TO 7 PM MDT /8 PM CDT/ TUESDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 002, 013, 014, 027, 028, 041, 042, 079, 252, 253, AND 254... * Affected Area...In Colorado, Fire Weather Zone 252 Yuma, Fire Weather Zone 253 Kit Carson and Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 001 Cheyenne, Fire Weather Zone 002 Rawlins, Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman, Fire Weather Zone 014 Thomas, Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace, Fire Weather Zone 028 Logan, Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita. In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 079 Dundy. * Winds...South 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts...Extreme and unpredictable fire behavior. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
info.instruction: Avoid outdoor burning...and any activities that may create sparks. Repeating...outdoor burning is not advised on Tuesday. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
